title: Irelia
body: Is Irelia a good champion for me to buy? I am in bronze 5 with 3.6k  I.P, Is she worth or should i buy someone else. I like to play melee champs so any other suggestions?

replies.body: I have had three best champs in LoL since I started playing. First one was Darius, then I had Irelia and now it is Sivir. She just has that little extra awesomeness that most other champions don't have. and it might take a few games to get a handle of her but it is worth it. you can pull off some sick as plays with here. Not to mention there are many different ways ou can build her. one of the best champs in my opinion. and she is actually strong as well. especially against any squishy top laners.
